title: [Alchemist, Hallway]
description: Massive chunks of stone and fallen timbers force anyone who would traverse the hallway to duck and weave through the hazardous ruin, a labyrinth made more disorienting by the light dusting of broken glass sparkling from every surface.  Although shadows dominate the wreckage, a single shaft of moonlight lances down through a gaping hole in the ceiling, illuminating a round spot on the dusty, threadbare hall rug.
